headline: Mastercard Board of Directors Announces Quarterly Dividend and $14 Billion Share Repurchase Program
summary: PURCHASE, N.Y., December 09, 2025--The Mastercard (NYSE: MA) Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of 87 cents per share and approved a new share repurchase program.

headline: Mission Valley Bank Unveils Sleek, Bold, Contactless Mastercard® Business Debit Card
summary: Mission Valley Bank today announced the launch of its new Mastercard® Business Debit Card, a major enhancement to the Bank's suite of business banking solutions. Designed with sleek, bold, contactless functionality and built for entrepreneurs, nonprofits, and business professionals who demand speed, security, and control, the new debit card reinforces Mission Valley Bank's commitment to delivering high-touch, high-performance financial tools that move at the pace of modern business.

headline: Spark Announces 2025 Design Award Winners
summary: 19TH Annual Award Winners include entries from Austria, Belgium, Brasil, China, Italy, Netherlands, South Korea, Singapore, Taiwan, UK & USA. "Spark is delighted to highlight a year of quite wonderful Design and Designers," reported CEO/Founder Peter Kuchnicki, "We congratulate the winners and thank all participants, our terrific judges and the team who pulled it together!"
